title: Lets play....... What if!
body:
Simple game: Someone says a what if question and then if you feel like you have a comment or something that you would do if that happened.

ME: What if draven had a global charm?
You: Doesnt he already?



What if when sion ulti'd it played miley cyrus's Wrecking ball?

replies.body: ~~What if Tahm has a vore fetish?~~
Vole fetish? He likes small rodents?
What if {{champion:26}} ults an {{champion:245}} with {{item:3026}} while he also ults just as he's about to die?
What if Rammus was regarded as a pop star in Valoran?

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QlA9JEwg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:53:32.951+0000)
>
> What if Rammus was regarded as a pop star in Valoran?

but doesn't he like rock n' roll
